text: Sadat Hussain (24 November 1946 â€“ 22 April 2020) was a Bangladeshi civil servant. He notably served as chairman of the Bangladesh Public Service Commission from 2007 to 2011. He was born in Noakhali District. On 22 April 2020, Husain died of kidney disease and other causes at a Dhaka hospital. He was 73. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Chittagong Division Category:Civil servants Category:Deaths from kidney disease
title: Saadat Husain
